com.twitter.sdk.android.tweetui.internal

Class SpanClickHandler

  • Object
    • com.twitter.sdk.android.tweetui.internal.SpanClickHandler

  • public class SpanClickHandler
extends Object
    A helper class that enables support for clicks on spans in a the text of a TextView or a Layout. The text in the layout must be of type Spanned, and the spans need to implement HighlightedClickableSpan.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpanClickHandler(View view, Layout layout)
      Creates an instance of this helper for a layout and its containing view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void enableClicksOnSpans(TextView textView) 
      boolean handleTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
      Takes a motion event from the processing view and check for clicks on any of the clickable spans in the layout.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static void enableClicksOnSpans(TextView textView)

      • handleTouchEvent

        public boolean handleTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        Takes a motion event from the processing view and check for clicks on any of the clickable spans in the layout.
        Parameters:
        event - The motion event.
        Returns:
        true if the event has been handled.
